name: Mozzarella
description: A mild, white cheese that melts easily and is commonly used on pizza.

name: Parmesan
description: A hard, sharp cheese with a distinctive flavor. Often used in combination with other cheeses on pizza.

name: Cheddar
description: A firm, yellow cheese with a sharp taste. Not as commonly used on pizza as some other cheeses.

name: Gouda
description: A semi-hard cheese with a mild, nutty flavor. Can be used in place of mozzarella on pizza for a different taste.

name: Feta
description: A crumbly, salty cheese that is commonly used on Greek-style pizza.
